pr_title: Bugfix/errors in logs after session expiry

timeline.message:
Throw exceptions when renderedBody does not have a match;
Use full screen mode for ajax request

Revert "Throw exceptions when renderedBody does not have a match;"

This reverts commit f7ae4267bd136f4fbf82b848cc30339a2ea3a809.
Remove the Scala MatchError from Resource-center logs for 'ajaxResponse'

timeline.bodyText:
Cool, I see you're simply making the error trigger explicit rather than waiting for RestEasy to stumble over a null. As a result also, there is no change to the user experience.
One thing though, rather than a blanket 500, this is probably a good case for 501 - Not Implemented. Because essentially, you're saying if it's not one of the above matches (or types we know how to handle) then fail - i.e. because the code hasn't been implemented to support it (and indeed, probably never will be as we'll get the New UI done first).
So if you can tweak to a  501, that'd be fine.
timeline.author: edalex-ian
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -656,6 +658,9 @@ class LegacyContentApi {
       case tr: TemplateResult    => tr.getNamedResult(context, "body")
       case sr: SectionRenderable => sr
       case pr: PreRenderable     => new PreRenderOnly(pr)
+      //Due to many unknowns of what could cause renderedBody being null, return a 500 error at the moment.
+      case _ =>
+        LOGGER.debug("Unknown error at renderedBody - ajaxResponse"); return Response.serverError();

timeline.message: The response code should be 501 rather than 500.
